thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
The Price of Tariffs
As President Trump prepares to sign a proclamation as soon as Thursday afternoon laying out his plan to impose new tariffs on steel and aluminum, Republican lawmakers are ramping up efforts aimed at reversing the proposal against a backdrop of concerns over a possible trade war and its impact on global growth. More than 100 Republicans in the House sent a letter to the White House objecting to Mr. Trump’s plan, urging the president to reconsider “broad tariffs to avoid unintended negative...
